name: 3D Hero Block Skins Run Games
description:
Let Hero run & jump with simple control, and collect as many coin as possible in your race! Super cool 3D running game in Hero Match Rival! Let's free to unlock our companions! To running in our WORLD!!!!

## FEATURES ##
- Running in 3D world with cool heroes.
- 50+ Stage levels will enjoy with you.
- Avoid the obstacles like rock, tree, block and slope curve land.
- 10+ Power up items etc. Flying boot, invincible potion, Magnet and any.
- Very cute and cool HD graphics.
- Collect the items to get FEVER explore the WORLD of GALAXY STAR!!!
- Get all characters for your collection.
- Challenge yourself by defeat your High Score.
- In Free Version Game Start with 500 Coins
